Name: Slime Dungeon Escape
About the game: Slime Dungeon Escape is a simple skill-based 2D platformer where you want to help slime escape from the dungeon. Game consists of 45 levels with varied difficulty, from easy to very hard. Your goal is to avoid different traps and enemies to reach the escape door and complete the level.
